attributes.action: make vampires a recognised and respected culture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: vampires are regarded in low status in todays society. they cant get good jobs. they are rejected and repressed just because they are different and have a different way of living. at school, they are mocked and teased. i see this as a mild form of racism. i call this "vampire-ism" please help me to try and insert vampires into a safe and frindly community.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
